definitions.definition: Someone possessing extraordinary intelligence or skill ; especially somebody who has demonstrated this by a creative or original work in science, music, art etc.
examples: She's a genius ; she won a Nobel Prize at fifteen!

definitions.definition: Inspiration , a mental leap, an extraordinary creative process.
examples: to add a dash of cinnamon amid such umami was pure genius

definitions.definition: The tutelary deity or spirit of a place or person .
examples: and the genius of the place: the growing enthusiasm for codified standards in the Army and Navy

main_definition: ( countable ) Someone possessing extraordinary intelligence or skill ; especially somebody who has demonstrated this by a creative or original work in science, music, art etc.
secondary_definitions: ( uncountable ) Inspiration , a mental leap, an extraordinary creative process.
( countable , Roman mythology , also figuratively ) The tutelary deity or spirit of a place or person .
